isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HUBS, BEARINGS, AND SEALS - BEARING CUP (RACE) - REMOVE (ALUMINUM HUB) (WHEEL ASSEMBLY REMOVED FROM HUB)

svcproc.title: REMOVE (ALUMINUM HUB) (WHEEL ASSEMBLY REMOVED FROM HUB)

step1.para: Clean hub with a non-flammable cleaner.
Place the hub on a firm, clean surface with the cup to be removed facing down.
Using a hammer and a drift, carefully drive the cup out of the hub by striking on the lip of the cup. It is necessary to use many soft blows placed about 90° apart.

svcproc.para: Alternate Method: After the hub is clean from grease and debris, place hub in an oven and heat the hub assembly evenly to 180°F to 210°F (82°C - 99°C). Quickly remove the hub from the oven and place the hub on a firm, clean surface with the cup to be removed facing down, then proceed with step 3.

warning.para: Wear gloves when handling hot hub assembly to prevent personal injury.
